should talk to your midwife 
or doctor, who can check 
whether you are immune

cases,	the	baby	is	not	affected	
when a pregnant woman 
is infected with parvovirus. 
However, it will be necessary 
to perform extra scans 
to ensure the baby is not 
affected.
Listeriosis
Listeriosis is a rare infection 
that is usually caught from 
eating food containing listeria 
bacteria.  People such as
